EmailTemplate.name: CA Tele Inbound - QBSE
EmailTemplate.subject: QuickBooks Self-Employed Download Link
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your call today. It was great chatting with you.
As we discussed, I believe QuickBooks Self-Employed would be a good fit for you with your current business needs. With QuickBooks Self-Employed you can keep your expenses, invoices, and mileage all in one place, and with a simple click or swipe have instant real-time business insights on one dashboard. As an app, QuickBooks Self-Employed goes with you as you work on the go.
Please visit this link (https://cvc4.app.link/telein) to download a copy of the QuickBooks Self-Employed App where you will have the opportunity to test drive our product for 30-Days free. You can also take advantage of our special offer of 50% off if you subscribe today in product today as well.
Thank you again for your time today!
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName}
--
To unsubscribe or change your email preferences, click here: http://go.quickbooks.intuit.ca/unsubscribe/u/43812/7856fa597f085475b993756cea04b2872f56a13c222f792859f4ec8ce3df317f/626744520
Intuit respects your privacy. To learn more read our Privacy Statement: http://www.intuit.ca/about-intuit-canada/info/privacy-policy.jsp?cid=edm_SBG_footer_QBO-FTU-LEVEL3-NONTRIALSUBS-CAN-EN-02_CAN_HTML_PRIVACY
If you receive a suspicious email, please report it by forwarding the email to spoof@intuit.com. Visit Security to find out more: http://quickbooks.intuit.ca/about-intuit-canada/info/security/
